setting.metadataKeywordDesc: The key name that reads the enabled status from the {placeholder}.
setting.commonConfigDesc: Set the default heading decorator for all modes.
setting.enabledInReadingDesc: Allow to decorate the heading under the reading view.
setting.enabledInReadingConfigDesc: Ignore the generic heading decorator config and set the heading decorator for the reading view.
setting.enabledInPreviewDesc: Allow to decorate the heading under the live preview.
setting.enabledInPreviewConfigDesc: Ignore the generic heading decorator config and set the heading decorator for the live preview.
setting.enabledInSourceDesc: Allow to decorate the heading under the source mode.
setting.enabledInSourceConfigDesc: Ignore the generic heading decorator config and set the heading decorator for the source mode.
setting.enabledInOutlineDesc: Allow to decorate the heading under the outline plugin.
setting.enabledInOutlineConfigDesc: Ignore the generic heading decorator config and set the heading decorator for the outline plugin.
setting.enabledInQuietOutlineDesc: Allow to decorate the heading under the {placeholder} plugin.
setting.enabledInQuietOutlineConfigDesc: Ignore the generic heading decorator config and set the heading decorator for the "Quiet Outline" plugin.
setting.enabledInFileExplorerDesc: Allow to decorate the heading under the {placeholder} plugin.
setting.enabledInFileExplorerConfig: Heading decorator for "Headings in Explorer" plugin
setting.enabledInFileExplorerConfigDesc: Ignore the generic heading decorator config and set the heading decorator for the "Headings in Explorer" plugin.
setting.enabledInEachNoteDesc: Toggle this setting to enable the decoration of headings in each note.
setting.orderedDesc: Toggle this setting to enable the decoration of headings as an ordered or unordered list.
setting.opacityDesc: Set the opacity of the heading decorator. The value is the form of percentage.
setting.positionDesc: Set the position of the heading decorator.
setting.orderedStyleTypeDesc: Set the style type for ordered list.
setting.orderedDelimiterDesc: Set the delimiter for ordered list.
setting.orderedTrailingDelimiterDesc: Set whether to add a trailing delimiter for ordered list.
setting.orderedCustomIdentsDesc: For the "Custom list styles" option. Set custom list styles for ordered list. Use spaces to separate entries.
setting.orderedSpecifiedStringDesc: For the "Specified string" option. Set a specified string for ordered list.
setting.orderedAllowZeroLevelDesc: If the next heading is more than one level higher, the omitted level is zero instead of one.
setting.orderedBasedOnExisting: Based on the existing highest level
setting.orderedBasedOnExistingDesc: Use the highest level of headings in the note as the base for ordered list.
setting.orderedAlwaysIgnoreDesc: Exclude the top-level heading when building ordered lists. controlled by the "Maximum number of ignored levels" option.
setting.orderedIgnoreSingle: Ignore the single heading at the top-level
setting.orderedIgnoreSingleDesc: If the top-level has only a single heading, exclude it when building an ordered list. controlled by the "Maximum number of ignored levels" option.
setting.orderedIgnoreMaximumDesc: When enabling the option to ignore top-level headings, specify the maximum number of levels to ignore.
setting.unorderedLevelHeadingsDesc: Set the names for each level. The value is 6 entries separated by spaces.
setting.hideNumberSigns: Hide number signs on inactive lines
setting.hideNumberSignsDesc: Hide number signs (#) on inactive lines similar to live preview.
setting.folderBlocklistAddTip: Add a new folder to the blocklist
setting.fileRegexBlocklistAddTip: Add a new note name regex blocklist
